summary: Comprehensive testing completed for ConstructOS project tracking app iteration 2 with new Quick Update page and history tracking features. All backend APIs including new history endpoints are functioning perfectly. Quick Update page works seamlessly on both desktop and mobile with full task card functionality, progress sliders, notes, and history views. Task Tree history integration working correctly.

ui_bugs.issue: Task tree table shows loading spinner on mobile viewport and may not be fully responsive

design_issues.issue: DialogContent accessibility warnings in console - missing Description or aria-describedby

passed_tests: GET /api/tasks returns all 138 tasks correctly
GET /api/dashboard/stats provides complete project statistics
PUT /api/tasks/{id}/progress with update_notes field works correctly
GET /api/tasks/{id}/history returns task-specific update history
GET /api/history/recent returns recent updates with task names
History logging works for progress, date, and risk changes
PUT /api/tasks/{id}/dates logs date changes to history collection
PUT /api/tasks/{id}/risk logs risk changes to history collection
Quick Update page loads with all 104 leaf tasks as cards
Recent Updates section displays correctly on Quick Update page
Phase filter works correctly on Quick Update page
Search by task name and ID works on Quick Update page
Task card click opens update dialog with progress slider and notes
Progress slider and quick percentage buttons work properly
Update notes field accepts text input correctly
View Update History button shows chronological history
Save progress functionality works with success notifications
Navigation between Quick Update and Task Tree works seamlessly
History button in Task Tree actions column opens history dialog
Progress edit buttons have visible orange styling
Mobile responsiveness works well for Quick Update page
Mobile navigation and dialogs function correctly
Excel and PDF report generation still working properly
Progress rollup functionality continues working correctly
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix mobile responsiveness issue in Task Tree page - table may not be loading properly on mobile viewports. Add proper aria-describedby attributes to dialog components to resolve accessibility warnings.
